storyInfo: Karlan Trade is one of Rhodes Island's biggest clients, but a shipment of analgesics meant for their Infected employees goes missing. The Doctor uncovers the mastermind behind the plot, and develops a relationship with the president of Karlan Trade.

attributes.content: So you're saying the employees of the newly-established branch of Karlan Trade did not receive the first batch of pharmaceuticals we sent them?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Correct.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Also, our people found this in a nearby black market.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: This is... one of the analgesics we manufacture. You've cross-checked the serial number?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Mhm. I specifically checked with the Logistics Department—it's the very same batch we sent. In short, there's no need for any guessing games: without a doubt, someone pawned off our medicine.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: We didn't originally plan on involving you or the Doctor. After all, companies doing stuff like this isn't exactly uncommon, and we have relatively robust procedures in place to deal with it.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: But this time, we're dealing with one of Karlan Trade's branch offices, so we thought it'd be best to consult the two of you first.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Mm, I understand... Cliffheart is one of our operators now, and we do a substantial amount of business with them. Regardless of the perspective we're coming from, this matter must be handled carefully.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The core issue is this: was this an arbitrary decision from the other party's middle management, or did it have the tacit approval of the higher-ups?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Medic, you were a witness to the signing of the contract with Mr. Silverash. What do you think?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Hmm... It's hard to say.
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: We've maintained business ties with Karlan Trade for months now. There was nothing out-of-place with this particular large-batch order either. He came to us wanting to buy medicine, and we agreed—simple as that.
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: But we know nothing about how he actually views the Infected. And from the perspective of so-called business logic, he did in fact purchase this medicine from us with money.
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: It belongs to him now, and what he decides to do with it is up to him.
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: As for us though, this is not something we can simply write off as a 'business practice'.
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: Doctor, how do you view the situation?
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.options: Silverash? Who's that?;What kind of person is Silverash?;Silverash... What a unique surname...

attributes.content: Oh! I totally forgot; you weren't there at the time.
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: Excuse me. You've become so reliable lately that I've started to subconsciously assume that you already know everything...
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: Mr. Silverash's full name is Enciodes Silverash. He's the president of Karlan Trade and one of our major clients.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It seems he's always hoped to purchase a degree of personal protection for his Infected employees, as well as treatment for his younger sister who was infected with Oripathy.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: After contacting several pharmaceutical companies, he finally found us.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: That's right. He was very firm about this, though cautious as well. After a lengthy negotiation, he finally placed a large order with us.
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: He purchased a health insurance contract that covers all of his employees, as well as a supply of analgesics for each branch.
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: Because these analgesics are only effective at the disease's onset, we keep separate statistics on the amount delivered to each branch.
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: This is to ensure that every employee has a quarterly supply of them, as well as to allow the company to hold reserves.
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: Those were his demands.
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: To be honest, it was the first time I've seen an employer set aside this much money for Infected employees.
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: As for the kind of person the president is...
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: One year ago
You're going to order... this much at once?
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: That's right. You've proven to me that your analgesics work, and I mean to purchase a dose for each and every Infected in my employment.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: As such, I hope your company will be able to offer me a discount.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Well...
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: The size of this order is massive compared to anything else Rhodes Island has ever gotten. As a matter of principle, it's understandable that you'd want a discount.
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: However, the raw materials used to produce these drugs are also very expensive. In fact, the price of one dose of analgesic is not much higher than the cost.
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: If you lack the authority to make this decision, then you can ask the head of your company, Miss Amiya, to speak with me.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: No, I can make this decision.
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: What I wanted to say is––
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: Rhodes Island makes drugs to help the Infected.
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: I hope you can ensure that they're successfully delivered to those who need them.
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: Medic... Ma'am, your company seems to have a custom of calling each other by codenames, so I'd like to follow suit. Mind if I borrow you after this?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: Where are we...
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: A branch office I established in this city.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: President?! What brings you here?
attributes.name: Branch Office Manager

attributes.content: I want to meet with the Infected employees here. Make the arrangements.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: That day, I was able to witness Mr. Silverash personally distributing the analgesics to the Infected.
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: Then, as our partnership deepened, he even sent his little sister to us for treatment—the very same Cliffheart who is now one of our operators.
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: He sounds nothing like those bosses who make it obvious that they don't want to spend a single cent paying for medicine for their Infected employees.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Yeah. To be honest, even if what I saw was just a publicity stunt, there aren't many bosses in this world who would even bother putting on a show like that.
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.options: Leaning toward 'blame middle management' then?

attributes.content: I dare not say for sure.
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: I couldn't get a good read on him. He gave me the impression of someone completely inscrutable...
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: The more I started to trust him, the more the alarm bells in my head went off.
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.options: We need to confirm his true beliefs.;We need to be careful.;We can't ignore Cliffheart's feelings.

attributes.content: I doubt he'd be all that forthcoming if we took this to him to negotiate directly.
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: Right, considering he's both one of our major clients AND Cliffheart's brother...
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: If we aren't tactful, this could become a serious problem.
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: Right. If we were to arbitrarily cut off ties with Karlan Trade without hard evidence, that would be an extremely awkward situation for Cliffheart... and I don't want her to resent us.
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: So, what should we do, Doctor?
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.options: I have an idea.

attributes.content: Alright, morning's over.
attributes.name: Branch Office Manager

attributes.content: You have a one hour lunch break. Line up for your meals, and keep it orderly.
attributes.name: Branch Office Manager

attributes.content: (*whispers*) Phew... I managed to blend in, just as the Doctor requested. Now to take a look around...
attributes.name: Infected Employee?

attributes.content: Brother, are you new here?
attributes.name: Infected Employee

attributes.content: Ah, yes.
attributes.name: Infected Employee?

attributes.content: Then you've come to the right place. Our company treats the Infected pretty well.
attributes.name: Infected Employee

attributes.content: Yeah... I heard the same thing, and wanted to see for myself.
attributes.name: Infected Employee?

attributes.content: So, in your experience, is it really all it's cracked up to be?
attributes.name: Infected Employee?

attributes.content: Yeah. I actually used to work at a different factory. After I got sick, I was transferred here, which is specifically for Infected employees.
attributes.name: Infected Employee

attributes.content: At first I thought it'd be like the stuff you always hear about. Y'know, about how ordinary people wouldn't last a week in the conditions Infected workers had to deal with.
attributes.name: Infected Employee

attributes.content: But turns out it was a lot better than I expected.
attributes.name: Infected Employee

attributes.content: Plus, President Silverash personally bought us Oripathy painkillers from some drug company...
attributes.name: Infected Employee

attributes.content: The manager says the person with the best monthly performance gets a dose.
attributes.name: Infected Employee

attributes.content: Where else could you find a boss like that?
attributes.name: Infected Employee

attributes.content: Listen up, President Silverash will be coming for an inspection in two days.
attributes.name: Branch Office Manager

attributes.content: You two are pretty quick thinkers, so I'll have you greet him. You already know how to behave, yes?
attributes.name: Branch Office Manager

attributes.content: Yeah, of course. He's already doing so much for us, we wouldn't dare ask for anything more.
attributes.name: Infected Employee A

attributes.content: That's right. No way I'd find any other job as good as this one.
attributes.name: Infected Employee B

attributes.content: So...
attributes.name: Infected Employee A

attributes.content: Hmph. Here, these painkillers are for you.
attributes.name: Branch Office Manager

attributes.content: Thank you, thank you, thank you so much.
attributes.name: Infected Employee A

attributes.content: And who received the medication?
attributes.name: Branch Office Manager

attributes.content: Everyone! Everyone got some!
attributes.name: Infected Employee B

attributes.content: As long as you understand. Alright, now out of my sight.
attributes.name: Branch Office Manager

attributes.content: Yes, please excuse us.
attributes.name: Infected Employee A

attributes.content: Yes, we'll do just that... We won't bother you...
attributes.name: Infected Employee B

attributes.content: *spits* What a disgrace... We took all that medicine ourselves, and now we have to lie to the president for him.
attributes.name: Infected Employee A

attributes.content: What choice do we have? Would YOU report that to the president?
attributes.name: Infected Employee B

attributes.content: No...
attributes.name: Infected Employee A

attributes.content: Me neither. Who knows what he's like behind closed doors?
attributes.name: Infected Employee B

attributes.content: We don't even know if he'd side with us.
attributes.name: Infected Employee B

attributes.content: A boss who sides with the Infected? Pull the other one.
attributes.name: Infected Employee A

attributes.content: Still, it's true that we'll never find another gig as good as this place.
attributes.name: Infected Employee B

attributes.content: Yeah... I feel bad for our brothers, but what else can we do?
attributes.name: Infected Employee A

attributes.content: Mm. So, what're you gonna do with the medicine?
attributes.name: Infected Employee B

attributes.content: My wife ditched me after I got sick, leaving me alone with our daughter. I'd better keep it for myself...
attributes.name: Infected Employee A

attributes.content: Blimey, you've got it rough too.
attributes.name: Infected Employee B

attributes.content: And you?
attributes.name: Infected Employee A

attributes.content: I'll hold onto it for now.
attributes.name: Infected Employee B

attributes.content: Seems like it's only good for suppressing the pain when the disease flares up, but won't actually cure anything. So I'll save it for someone else in an emergency.
attributes.name: Infected Employee B

attributes.content: Never figured you for the generous sort.
attributes.name: Infected Employee A

attributes.content: We're all suffering here. I mean, it's not like you're some kinda sadist getting a kick out of it, right?
attributes.name: Infected Employee B

attributes.content: But if you can't take care of yourself, don't even think about taking care of others.
attributes.name: Infected Employee A

attributes.content: Doctor, you heard that through the communicator, right?
attributes.name: Infected Employee?

attributes.content: Yeah, it's the same everywhere you go.
attributes.name: Infected Employee?

attributes.content: Although in Victoria, some companies will continue employing the Infected if they accidentally contract Oripathy in the line of work.
attributes.name: Infected Employee?

attributes.content: Not that those jobs are much different from slavery.
attributes.name: Infected Employee?

attributes.content: Some nobles like to prattle on about these arrangements, as if it's some kind of Victorian largesse.
attributes.name: Infected Employee?

attributes.content: To put it bluntly, not many companies are willing to spend money on the Infected, and those who exploit them get away with a slap on the wrist at worst.
attributes.name: Infected Employee?

attributes.content: Tch.
attributes.name: Infected Employee?

attributes.content: However, judging from the few days I've spent undercover, this President Enciodes seems like quite the capable guy.
attributes.name: Infected Employee?

attributes.content: In just a few years, the Karlan Trade Company went from practically nothing to even having several branch offices in Victoria.
attributes.name: Infected Employee?

attributes.content: Plus, their treatment of the Infected actually seems half-decent.
attributes.name: Infected Employee?

attributes.content: Our contractual conditions aside, the way the company treats its Infected is better than any I've seen before.
attributes.name: Infected Employee?

attributes.content: No wonder they all seem to admire him here.
attributes.name: Infected Employee?

attributes.options: That only proves his management skills.;He could still have scalped the drugs.

attributes.content: That's... true.
attributes.name: Infected Employee?

attributes.content: Understood, Doctor. So you're saying we need conclusive evidence.
attributes.name: Infected Employee?

attributes.options: Where the drugs ended up.

attributes.content: Exactly!
attributes.name: Infected Employee?

attributes.content: Long time no see, Mr. Dyott.
attributes.name: Commercial Agent

attributes.content: Mr. Leyton! It certainly has been a while!
attributes.name: Branch Office Manager

attributes.content: How have you been?
attributes.name: Commercial Agent

attributes.content: Ahh, thanks to you, I've been able to eat well and sleep soundly. Not a worry to be found.
attributes.name: Branch Office Manager

attributes.content: Haha, I'm glad to hear that!
attributes.name: Commercial Agent

attributes.content: Um, about the thing I requested...
attributes.name: Commercial Agent

attributes.content: No worries. The painkillers are all in that box over there.
attributes.name: Branch Office Manager

attributes.content: Good, good! I'd expect nothing less from you, Mr. Dyott.
attributes.name: Commercial Agent

attributes.content: Hmm? Isn't this batch... a bit smaller than it's supposed to be?
attributes.name: Commercial Agent

attributes.content: We're in an off-season right now, so fewer Infected are showing up for work. But as you know, our company is quite renowned among their kind. Consistency is key.
attributes.name: Branch Office Manager

attributes.content: I know, I know.
attributes.name: Commercial Agent

attributes.content: I'm not trying to hide anything from you. I kept some for myself, as usual. I'm not that cold-blooded, the Infected DO need to survive, after all!
attributes.name: Branch Office Manager

attributes.content: Ah, you have a point. Tsk, tsk. Leaders like you who are still truly willing to look out for the Infected are a rare find these days.
attributes.name: Commercial Agent

attributes.content: No, no. Trust me, Mr. Leyton, this will be the latest trend, one of civility.
attributes.name: Branch Office Manager

attributes.content: Those backwards Ursus savages only know how to hunt and kill the Infected. How primitive.
attributes.name: Branch Office Manager

attributes.content: And even most of our Victorian colleagues only know how to squeeze them bone-dry. How terribly uncivilized.
attributes.name: Branch Office Manager

attributes.content: The Infected are not animals. They understand language. Reward them appropriately, and they'll work even harder.
attributes.name: Branch Office Manager

attributes.content: This way, we can show kindness to the Infected while also furthering our business. What could be more enlightened?
attributes.name: Branch Office Manager

attributes.content: You're exactly right! Praise to the civilized land of Victoria, and praise to President Enciodes, who treats the Infected with compassion!
attributes.name: Commercial Agent

attributes.content: Praise to civility!
attributes.name: Branch Office Manager

attributes.content: Praise to civility!
attributes.name: Commercial Agent

attributes.content: Ugh, I... If I didn't have to worry about blowing my cover, I would seriously rush over and beat the shit out of those two slimy bastards.
attributes.name: Infected Employee?

attributes.content: But at least this confirms that President Enciodes isn't personally involved.
attributes.name: Infected Employee?

attributes.content: Hmph. Bet they never expected to have each and every one of their hypocritical words captured on record.
attributes.name: Infected Employee?

attributes.content: Praise the painkiller!
attributes.name: Branch Office Manager

attributes.content: Praise the painkiller!
attributes.name: Commercial Agent

attributes.content: *sharp inhale*... Phew, hold it in... Hold it in... I have to record all this.
attributes.name: Infected Employee?

attributes.content: Doctor, this should be sufficient proof.
attributes.name: Infected Employee?

attributes.content: I sent you a copy, but I wouldn't recommend listening to it too often, if you enjoy sleeping at night.
attributes.name: Infected Employee?

attributes.options: I'll be fine.;I'm used to it.;Scumbags. The whole lot of them.

attributes.content: So, the next step is to tell President Enciodes about everything that's going on.
attributes.name: Infected Employee?

attributes.content: What's the plan?
attributes.name: Infected Employee?

attributes.options: He's coming for inspection in two days.

attributes.content: Oh, did you hear? Apparently, the president arrived in the city yesterday.
attributes.name: Infected Employee A

attributes.content: Really? Word is he's planning a look around the factory.
attributes.name: Infected Employee B

attributes.content: Yeah, that's right.
attributes.name: Infected Employee A

attributes.content: Wonderful! I've always wanted to meet the guy who started this company.
attributes.name: Infected Employee B

attributes.content: So, you...
attributes.name: Infected Employee A

attributes.content: Ngh... Argh...
attributes.name: Infected Employee?

attributes.content: What's wrong?!
attributes.name: Infected Employee

attributes.content: Help... My Oripathy's acting up!
attributes.name: Infected Employee?

attributes.content: What?!
attributes.name: Infected Employee

attributes.content: Tch, if this guy blows up, I'm done for too!
attributes.name: Infected Employee

attributes.content: In other words, put on a show and make sure word reaches the whole city.
attributes.name: Infected Employee?

attributes.content: President, this is our statement from the last quarter. Please take a look.
attributes.name: Branch Office Manager

attributes.content: Mm.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Afterward, if you wish to take a look around the facilities, I've specifically invited a few representatives from both our Infected and ordinary employees to give you a tour.
attributes.name: Branch Office Manager

attributes.content: Surely they'll be able to tell you more of the ins-and-outs of working here than I can.
attributes.name: Branch Office Manager

attributes.content: Hello, Mr. President.
attributes.name: Infected Employee A

attributes.content: Good day, Mr. President.
attributes.name: Infected Employee B

attributes.content: How many times have you rehearsed this? Have you finished preparing what you want me to see?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Um... Uh...
attributes.name: Branch Office Manager

attributes.content: Dyott, I don't particularly care what you're trying to hide from me. All I care about are the results.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: A word of advice though—if you plan on deceiving someone, don't make it so obvious.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: ...Yessir.
attributes.name: Branch Office Manager

attributes.content: Did you become Infected while working for our company?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I did, Mr. President.
attributes.name: Infected Employee A

attributes.content: I joined after hearing that the Infected are treated well here.
attributes.name: Infected Employee B

attributes.content: What do you think of Karlan Trade?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I think I've definitely been treated well here.
attributes.name: Infected Employee A

attributes.content: I agree.
attributes.name: Infected Employee B

attributes.content: More to the point...
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Out of the way!
What's the commotion?
attributes.name: Branch Office Manager

attributes.content: Lemme through, lemme through!
attributes.name: Infected Employee?

attributes.content: If I remember correctly, you're one of the new hires... What exactly do you think you're doing? Can't you see that the president is here?
attributes.name: Branch Office Manager

attributes.content: Are you President Enciodes? H-help me, there's something wrong with my body! I need medicine!
attributes.name: Infected Employee?

attributes.content: The medicine should already have been handed out.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: What? I didn't get anything!
attributes.name: Infected Employee?

attributes.content: You want me to pretend that I'm suffering from an acute episode of Oripathy in front of President Silverash?
attributes.name: Infected Employee?

attributes.options: That way, none of our people will be present.;With no outsiders, we'll see his honest reaction.

attributes.content: I see. So that's how we'll find out how he truly sees the Infected...
attributes.name: Infected Employee?

attributes.content: Don't worry, you'll be fine.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Dyott, bring out the medicine.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: R-right away!
attributes.name: Branch Office Manager

attributes.content: You're not afraid of me...?
attributes.name: Infected Employee?

attributes.content: You're my employee. Why would I be afraid of you?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: To think that the president would treat an Infected so kindly, even in person... I've never met anyone like him...
attributes.name: Infected Employee A

attributes.content: As long as you're with Karlan Trade, you're all my employees. Infected or not, it makes no difference to me.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: More importantly, shouldn't the analgesic have already been distributed to him?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: That... Haha... Right, it's because he's a new hire... It wasn't his turn yet!
attributes.name: Branch Office Manager

attributes.content: Is that the best lie you could come up with? Each batch has extras rationed in precisely for this situation.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: President, Dyott, he... didn't distribute medicine to the employees at all. Here, I have proof.
attributes.name: Infected Employee?

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: The Infected employee struggled to produce a pen-like device from his clothing and gave it a light tap. From it flowed the conversation between Dyott and Leyton at the bar.
Wh-when did you––!
attributes.name: Branch Office Manager

attributes.content: Dyott, you bastard!
attributes.name: Infected Employee A

attributes.content: President, General Manager Dyott did not distribute the painkillers to the Infected employees at all! What's worse, he deceived everyone by saying that painkillers would only be given to the best performers!
attributes.name: Infected Employee A

attributes.content: You—!
attributes.name: Branch Office Manager

attributes.content: Calm down!
attributes.name: Infected Employee B

attributes.content: After seeing how kindly the president treated an Infected, I can't keep quiet anymore!
attributes.name: Infected Employee A

attributes.content: Not only that, he violated the employee handbook by squeezing our breaks and making us work nonstop!
attributes.name: Infected Employee A

attributes.content: He may not have gone overboard, to keep you from finding out, but he's definitely guilty! Just ask anyone here!
attributes.name: Infected Employee A

attributes.content: Tch...
attributes.name: Infected Employee B

attributes.content: He's telling the truth, President! Dyott acts all high-and-mighty like he's our savior, humiliating us and forcing us to serve him! He's a rotten bastard, through and through!
attributes.name: Infected Employee B

attributes.content: How dare you!
attributes.name: Branch Office Manager

attributes.content: My friend here still needs some medication for his daughter, so use my dose, President!
attributes.name: Infected Employee B

attributes.content: I understand.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I appreciate your kindness.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: However, this employee's Oripathy symptoms are quite dangerous. I'll handle the situation myself, just in case.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: But then you'll be exposing yourself to danger!
attributes.name: Infected Employee A

attributes.content: Trust me.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Alright, I trust you.
attributes.name: Infected Employee B

attributes.content: Me too! I'll never forget what happened today!
attributes.name: Infected Employee A

attributes.content: Go. Get away from here, the further the better.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: (*whispers*) So this is Enciodes Silverash... What an incredible man...
attributes.name: Infected Employee?

attributes.content: P-President...
attributes.name: Branch Office Manager

attributes.content: Don't be nervous, Dyott.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: As a manager, you should understand which side to let your subordinates see, and which side should stay hidden.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Whether through currying favor or issuing threats, you should have ensured that your collaborators would never betray you.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: It seems whatever threats you gave those two were merely superficial.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You... You're not mad at me?
attributes.name: Branch Office Manager

attributes.content: Why would I be mad?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Although you violated the rules I set, you did produce results. Why should I be mad?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: As for where the analgesics ended up, I could very well overlook that. You could consider them my reward to you.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Mr. President, did you lie to us?!
attributes.name: Infected Employee?

attributes.content: Hah... Haha, hahaha! As expected, Mr. President!
attributes.name: Branch Office Manager

attributes.content: That's right! You Infected are going to die sooner or later anyway, so what difference does a little bit of medicine make?
attributes.name: Branch Office Manager

attributes.content: And as a noble, it is sometimes necessary to show the Infected their place. That's the only way they'll know what it really means to be a noble.
attributes.name: Branch Office Manager

attributes.content: I knew you signed that contract with Rhodes Island just for show, to establish your image in front of the other nobles!
attributes.name: Branch Office Manager

attributes.content: I'll admit my mistakes. If you're willing to forgive me, I'll be glad to give you half the profits from reselling the medicine!
attributes.name: Branch Office Manager

attributes.content: Naturally, no one will ever know.
attributes.name: Branch Office Manager

attributes.content: Half?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Um... Seventy percent, no, eighty! I- I need to make a living too, President.
attributes.name: Branch Office Manager

attributes.content: Oh? I couldn't care less about the money though. I'm more keen on meeting whoever you've been cutting this deal with.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I'm interested in learning to make better use of Rhodes Island's medicine.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Is that what this is about? No problem, I can arrange some contacts for you. Just tell them I sent you!
attributes.name: Branch Office Manager

attributes.content: Is there anyone from any other branches involved?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Well...
attributes.name: Branch Office Manager

attributes.content: You are my first business partner in this particular matter. Consider the implications of that.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Aha... Silly me, how could I be so forgetful. I have it all written down right here in my notes.
attributes.name: Branch Office Manager

attributes.content: Um, if you're planning to get your foot in the door, then I do hope that you'll bring me along, hehe...
attributes.name: Branch Office Manager

attributes.content: And you're saying all this right in front of me? You're not afraid I'll spread the word?
attributes.name: Infected Employee?

attributes.content: Spread the word?
attributes.name: Branch Office Manager

attributes.content: Did you seriously expect to walk out of here alive?
attributes.name: Branch Office Manager

attributes.content: The loss of a single employee is nothing to a company this large.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You won't get away with this!
attributes.name: Infected Employee?

attributes.content: The Infected can use Arts without the assistance of an Arts Unit.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Your contagiousness is a dangerous uncertainty.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: After death, it may trigger a secondary outbreak, endangering the surrounding environment and its people.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Infected Employee?

attributes.content: Enciodes walks up to the employee, reaches for his chest to fish out a terminal that had never stopped transmitting, and speaks to the person on the other end.
What I want to know is this: why do you think you people deserve to be treated well?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.options: Enough is enough.;The Infected expect nothing.;That's the goal we're striving for.

attributes.content: To be honest, I am also of the opinion that we should bring this little farce to an end.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I should thank you.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: And you, I'm afraid, should also be thanking me, Doctor of Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Quite an outdated rebuttal.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: What we are going through is not a process, but rather the culmination of thousands of years.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: How long would it take to shake off such a thing?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: When you lack a clear path to the end goal, all your effort is... nothing but deceit, both of yourself and others.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: But I'm not here today to haphazardly give out assessments of your unrealistic goals.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Because you showed up in front of me.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: To put it simply, is this information enough to demonstrate the sincerity of Karlan Trade?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.options: Good enough.

attributes.content: Excellent.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Huh...?
attributes.name: Infected Employee?

attributes.content: P-President?
attributes.name: Branch Office Manager

attributes.content: Thank you for the intel, Dyott. You've successfully restored Karlan Trade's reputation in the eyes of Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Could this man be from Rhodes Island?!
attributes.name: Branch Office Manager

attributes.content: You should've realized that sooner.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: And now, unfortunately, you're fired.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You... You were lying to me this whole time?
attributes.name: Branch Office Manager

attributes.content: But, why?!
attributes.name: Branch Office Manager

attributes.content: Do you really empathize with these filthy Infected?!
attributes.name: Branch Office Manager

attributes.content: You are not worthy of having that conversation with me.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: B-But... Didn't you say you acknowledged my results?!
attributes.name: Branch Office Manager

attributes.content: All I said was that you produced results.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: But did you seriously think that those results would satisfy me?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: They did not.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Extraordinary means should produce extraordinary outcomes. But even utilizing extraordinary means, the results you showed me are something anyone could muster...
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: What possessed you to think that they would satisfy me?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Dyott, the Branch Officer Manager, slumped to the ground limply, like a pile of mud.
Look, it's the President!
attributes.name: Infected Employee A

attributes.content: I went to Rhodes Island to purchase medication and an insurance package for all of you, to ensure the health and safety of all my Infected employees.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: However, due to the negligence of our management as well as the local manager, this medicine was not properly delivered to you. For this, I deeply apologize.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: It isn't your fault!
attributes.name: Infected Employee A

attributes.content: It's all Dyott's fault!
attributes.name: Infected Employee B

attributes.content: Yes, Dyott has already been fired, and a new manager will be selected from among you.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I hope that this will help ensure better conditions for you to continue with your work.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: What? That's incredible!
attributes.name: Infected Employees

attributes.content: Long live the President!
attributes.name: Infected Employees

attributes.content: In particular, there are two people here I'd like to thank.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Both are special investigators from Rhodes Island... Thanks to their bravery, I was able to discover what Dyott had been hiding from me.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Isn't that the new guy...?
attributes.name: Infected Employee A

attributes.content: So they're from the company that makes our medicine?!
attributes.name: Infected Employee B

attributes.content: They're willing to do all that for our sakes...?
attributes.name: Infected Employee A

attributes.options: That's our duty at Rhodes Island.;You can always trust in Rhodes Island.;The lives of the Infected are just as precious.

attributes.content: There are many who do not understand why I would purchase medication. This lack of understanding eventually gave rise to violations of company policy.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: In order to prevent this situation from occurring again, I negotiated with Rhodes Island to send an undercover team to secretly surveil this branch office.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: The intent was to sniff out people like Dyott, who would harm both our company's operations as well as Rhodes Island's image.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: In return, Rhodes Island is willing to deepen its cooperation with Karlan Trade and further reduce the price of medication.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Isn't that right, Dr. {@nickname}?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.options: ...That's exactly right.

attributes.content: Huh? Did you really arrange all that, Doctor?!
attributes.name: Infected Employee?

attributes.content: As a follow up, Rhodes Island is willing to provide on-site medical examinations for all employees on the job, free of cost.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Everyone, please line up here so we can pass out the analgesics.
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.options: When did you find out?

attributes.content: What a vapid question.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I should be the one asking you—did you really plan on deceiving me, Dr. {@nickname} of Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.options: No.

attributes.content: You at least considered the possibility that I would let my guard down upon seeing that 'Infected'.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Because for you, your objective had already been accomplished by that point.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Regardless of how it unfolded afterward, you'd never have a losing hand. Not a bad plan.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.options: You flatter me.;I'm not so sure about that.

attributes.content: It is no secret that Rhodes Island suddenly gained a masterful strategist, a leader capable of pulling together formidable forces and commanding the battlefield.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Before I met you, I never expected someone like that to personally show up at my company and stage a farce right in front of me.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.options: You seem to think highly of Rhodes Island.;Am I that famous?

attributes.content: My little sister has been receiving treatment there.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Two of my most exceptional subordinates also relay to me what they've seen.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Anyone who's seen even a glimpse of what's beneath your veil wouldn't dare underestimate you.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Your name has come up in conversation with my sister and my men more than once.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: There's no way I wouldn't know of your existence.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: So, Dr. {@nickname}, what I want to know is: did my answer satisfy you?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.options: It did.;It did not.

attributes.content: So you say, but your gaze clearly tells me that it did not.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Your acting wasn't terrible, so I'll take this as your way of asking me to leave it at this for now.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Am I wrong?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I don't particularly mind straight shooters.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: And you did just accept my little punishment for your brazenness without complaint.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: With that in mind, can I assume that we will continue our cooperation?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: That said, this has also raised my suspicions.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You were, without a doubt, engaged in theater, albeit one without backgrounds or props.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: It lacked anything to evoke emotions in the viewer.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You even prepared a terribly harrowing ending, knowing that all too well.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Tell me, what would've happened if I failed to meet your expectations?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.options: You would've lost a partner, that's all.

attributes.content: In a farce, an overly realistic ending may make it seem like the writers are splitting hairs.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Unless the essence of the farce is sufficiently important to you, the playwright.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: And in this case, that would be my views on the Infected.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Just how important is this question for you, Dr. {@nickname}?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.options: Very.;I choose my partners carefully.

attributes.content: Even though that medic lass asked me to personally deliver the medication to my employees, I didn't particularly view that as one of your main tenets.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: After this though, perhaps I'll have to somewhat revise my way of thinking...
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: It's just that I've seen all manner of idealists go on at great length about more or less everything under the sun.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: But not once have I heard one of them bring up the word 'Infected'.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Do you understand what that means, Dr. {@nickname}?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: It means that unless you're a bunch of lunatics, then...
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Where are you? It's time to go.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: I'll be right there.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Looks like our little chat must come to an end.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I can't answer your question just yet, Dr. {@nickname}.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: But, if you know how to play chess, then I look forward to learning from you when I visit Rhodes Island in the future.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: What happened?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Nothing much. Just a little detour.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You look like someone who's gone through a lot more than just a little detour.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Did you know that Rhodes Island's new leader is an amnesiac?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Huh...? Did you hit your head somewhere?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: They seem to have won over many operators there in a very short period of time, and have also set the company on a clear trajectory.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: While having amnesia.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Weird, but what does that have to do with you?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: I don't know yet.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You don't know yet?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: I don't know yet.
attributes.name: Enciodes
